title: What courses do you offer?
content: We offer a variety of courses designed to enhance your skills in software development, UI/UX design, and cloud technologies.

title: How much do courses and mentorship sessions cost?
content: Our courses range from $200 to $500, while mentorship sessions cost between $100 and $300 per hour, depending on the mentor's expertise.

title: Is this platform suitable for beginners?
content: Absolutely! Our programs are designed for learners of all levels, including beginners looking to start their tech journey.

title: How do mentorship sessions work?
content: Mentorship sessions are 1-on-1 or group-based, conducted online with industry experts, focusing on practical learning and career growth.
